name: DURIAN KAHWIN 1KG
description: Our Durian Kahwin is the perfect blend of Malaysia’s finest durian varieties ,handpicked for their rich aroma, creamy texture, and unforgettable flavour. It’s our way of sharing the true taste of premium durian, crafted with love and tradition in every bite.

name: DURIAN KAHWIN IN BOX 1Kg
description: Our Durian Kahwin in a Box brings convenience and freshness together in one perfect package. Each box is filled with our best durian flesh, carefully sealed and chilled to preserve its natural taste ,making it easy to share, gift, or enjoy anytime, anywhere.
